   Description  
________________
_______________________________________________________________
A young boy watches his parents killed by a thief in a Santa 
suit. He spends his youth in an orphanage, staying quietly 
to his self, but his mind is further bent by an ironhanded 
Mother Superior. He finally gets a job at a local store, 
where he finally snaps when he is required to wear a Santa 
suit, and goes on a killing spree that leads him slowly back 
to the orphanage
